description:
By the end of this course, you will be able to migrate any Drupal 7 website to a Wordpress 3.9 installation. Moreover, you will have an overall understanding of the differences between Drupal and Wordpress table schema to estimate the migrated content scope.

  • Includes a step-by-step video tutorial of how to migrate a Drupal website to Wordpress.
  • Includes a review of Drupal and Wordpress database schema to understand migration effort and complexity.
  • Enrich your skill-set with this knowledge and extend your Wordpress consultancy reach

** The content migrated doesn't include images
title: Step-by-Step Drupal 7 to Wordpress Migration
